Version.description: Version of the schema used to validate this document. Current version : 2.

VariableName.description: Name of the parameter. Must be unique and present in the FMI model description.

Value.description: The new start value of this parameter variable.

Transformation.description: Allows to add a linear transformation (factor and offset) and a typecast to the data before it is serialized by SIL Kit.

Offset.description: Offset applied (with an addition) in a linear transformation to the variables before being transmitted. Applied after Factor. Defaults to 0.

Factor.description: Factor applied (with a multiplication) in a linear transformation to the variables before being transmitted. Applied before Offset. Defaults to 1.

TransmissionType.description: Type used during SIL Kit transmission of the variable from/to the FMU. Only numerical scalar types and lists thereof are allowed. Types may be optional by appending a '?'. See documentation for details and restrictions. By default, no data conversion is done. For FMI 2.0, 'Real's are 'Float64' or 'Double,' and 'Integer's are 'Int32'.

ReverseTransform.description: Set to 'true' to inverse the linear transformation. Use this to reverse a transformation for which the parameters (factor and offset) are already known. No performance impact beyond initialization.

VariableName.description: Name of the variable in the model description.

TopicName.description: The topic under which the publisher / subscriber that corresponds to the variable sends / receives the data. Defaults to the name in the model description.

Include.description: Used to include contents of other valid FMU Importer configuration files.

Parameters.description: Used to override default values of parameters.

IgnoreUnmappedVariables.description: If 'true', prevent synchronization of variables that are not listed in VariableMappings (including parameters).

StepSize.description: Amount of time in nanoseconds between two simulation time steps. Defaults to the step size defined inside the FMU's model description if present, or 1 ms if not.

VariableMappings.description: Used to modify how a variable is represented in a SIL Kit simulation.

AlwaysUseStructuredNamingConvention.description: If 'true', the FMI structured naming convention detection is turned on, even if the FMU does not specify it.

Namespace.description: Namespace for all publishers and subscribers (only use for disambiguation - do not use if not necessary).

PublisherInstance.description: Instance name for all publishers (only use to disambiguate publishers with the same name - do not use if not necessary).

SubscriberInstance.description: Instance name for all subscribers (only use to disambiguate publishers with the same name - do not use if not necessary).

VariableMappings.description: Used to modify how a variable is represented in a SIL Kit simulation.
